column1: In often contentious exchanges the two candidates offered starkly different views of what it means to be a Democrat - and the best way to implement liberal policies.
Both candidates spent time on the offensive
column3: and defending their weaknesses. In the end
column4: the evening boiled down to five key questions and what they say about the state of the Democratic race.

column2: as Mr Sanders suggests? Or is incremental improvements and an emphasis on what is clearly achievable the way to go
